title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When I invoke the New Java Package wizard and do not enter any package name, a message appears at the top saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'.
EB: I expect that when the package name field is empty, no message should appear at the top of the New Java Package wizard.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe the message at the top of the wizard.
